eg.projects

Interface Configurable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProjectActions
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProject, GenericProject, HtmlProject, JavaProject, PerlProject, RProject

    public interface Configurable
    The interface that defines a configured project.

    The implementing class works in combination with an object that defines a a window where settings for a project are entered.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildSettingsWindow()
      Builds the content of the settings window
      boolean configureProject(java.lang.String dir)
      Returns if a project can be successfully configured based on the entries in this settings window and the specified directory
      java.lang.String getExecutableDirName()
      Returns the name of the directory where executable files are saved
      java.lang.String getProjectName()
      Returns the name of the project's root directory
      java.lang.String getProjectPath()
      Returns the path of the project's root directory
      ProjectTypes getProjectType()
      Returns the type of project
      boolean isInProject(java.lang.String dir)
      Returns if the specified directory belongs to the project
      void makeSettingsWindowVisible()
      Makes this settings window visible
      boolean retrieveProject(java.lang.String dir)
      Returns if a project stored in a preferences file can be retrieved based on the specified directory
      void setConfiguringAction(java.awt.event.ActionListener al)
      Sets the ActionListener that is called when the entries in the settings window are applied
      void storeConfiguration()
      Stores the configuration in a properties file
      boolean usesProjectFile()
      Returns if the project uses a main project file

        void buildSettingsWindow()
        Builds the content of the settings window

        Sets the ActionListener that is called when the entries in the settings window are applied
        Parameters:

      • makeSettingsWindowVisible

        void makeSettingsWindowVisible()
        Makes this settings window visible

      • configureProject

        boolean configureProject(java.lang.String dir)
        Returns if a project can be successfully configured based on the entries in this settings window and the specified directory
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may be or be contained in the presumed root directory of the project
        Returns:
        the boolean value that is true if the project could be configured

      • retrieveProject

        boolean retrieveProject(java.lang.String dir)
        Returns if a project stored in a preferences file can be retrieved based on the specified directory
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may be or be contained in the presumed root directory of the project
        Returns:
        the boolean value that is true if a saved project could be retrieved

      • getProjectType

        ProjectTypes getProjectType()
        Returns the type of project
        Returns:
        the type of project which is a constant in ProjectTypes

      • usesProjectFile

        boolean usesProjectFile()
        Returns if the project uses a main project file
        Returns:
        the boolean value. True if a project file is used.

      • isInProject

        boolean isInProject(java.lang.String dir)
        Returns if the specified directory belongs to the project
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory
        Returns:
        the boolean value that is true if the directory is or is contained in the project root

      • getProjectPath

        java.lang.String getProjectPath()
        Returns the path of the project's root directory
        Returns:
        the directory

        java.lang.String getProjectName()
        Returns the name of the project's root directory
        Returns:
        the name

        Returns:
        the name
